short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the preview of markdown text that you wrote right away by just select the text and click the icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is simple, straightforward markdown previewer for editing md file on web browser. You can get the preview of markdown text that you wrote right away by just select the text and click the icon.
